lenders.name: Megan

lenders.name: Stacia

lenders.loan_because: it takes a village.

lenders.name: Scott & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: The tasks before us seem less daunting when we stop and remember we can all lend a hand, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Sarah tries to protect lenders from writing bad real estate loans that will eventually lead to foreclosures. Scott tries to keep people in their homes if borrowers do end up in foreclosure. We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Mandi
lenders.loan_because: our family has been blessed and we would like to share this with those less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I create custom jewelry where I transform personal photographs into pendants to wear on necklaces and bracelets.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because:
My $25 loan can really help make a difference to someone who wants to improve his or her quality of life.

Kiva also allows for the cycle of giving to continue. Once my loan has been repaid, I can then loan again. I respect this organizational model.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an academic librarian at a community college in the Midwest.

lenders.name: DanaMichelle
lenders.loan_because: I am greatful for what I have and I hope to help others reach their dreams.

lenders.name: Marie

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a major bank.  My role is to redeploy our workforce into areas within the bank that need their skills and experience.  We want to keep  and retain our employees because they have the right experience and skills and they already know the company culture.

lenders.loan_because: I hope it's an effective way to use the money to improve the world.

lenders.name: Kristin

Bob: I study lakes - especially salty ones!

Claire: I'm in school.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.occupational_info: I apply myself in accordance with the will of God for the love of my fellow beings and the joy of doing it. I am a technologist with extensive experience in building successful global organizations.

lenders.name: Global Village Design
lenders.loan_because: others need the money more than i do....
lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites using computers that are powered by electricity created from wind. I give discounts to organizations that I believe are trying to make the world better for its citizens. I donate a portion of the business proceeds to organizations such as this one....

lenders.name: Valerie

The Bible, 1 John 3:18 NRSV
"Let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action."

lenders.occupational_info: I support a team of scientists that have an instrument on a spacecraft that's orbiting Saturn. I run websites, work with magazines, and help organize meetings.

lenders.occupational_info: I make the Internet

lenders.occupational_info: I design and manage websites for individuals and companies.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with buyers who are interested in buying homes or vacant land and sellers who are interested in selling their property.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: i was given a lot - i owe a lot to the rest of the world. i'm interested in the working poor, because of the strength of character exhibited in those who are willing to try to lift themselves out of a bad situation as best they can. their work inspires me and gives me hope.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a poet, photographer and activist. i work on social justice issues, including human/civil rights and enviro/animal rights. my poetry and photograhy, i hope, reflects my interest in people, nature and place.

lenders.loan_because: microfinance is a very good way to help people get a better life!
lenders.occupational_info: Gather Financial information, analyse and translate into financial reports

lenders.name: Carmen

I CAN! And there was a time where I could not.

Through the well timed goodness and generosity of others I've come to a place where I can give back.

I am a firm believer that the Universe never abandons anyone. Organizations such as Kiva and people just like YOU are proof of this.
lenders.occupational_info:
In my private counseling practice and online coaching practice I have the privilege to help guide individuals, couples and businesses through growth, change and transition.

Please consider joining my team here at Kiva to help take this intent global.

So when you have the vet out to help care for your sick or injured cow/cat/dog/horse, that will be me soon : )

lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.

I teach, plan, organize, edit, and other things. I am also a research assistant, doing research in social and personality psychology.

lenders.name: steve and monica
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping people
lenders.occupational_info: Steve works for a hotel company.  Monica works in a hospital

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: sharing gives me joy.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's an outreach that helps people to make permanent improvements in their lives. It is very practical too.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop medical equipment to help improve the quality of life for many other people.

lenders.name: Drake
lenders.loan_because: It's a chance for myself to contribute to the world from the ground up by directly impacting the lives of those willing to help themselves.  There isn't really a lack of food to feed the people of the world - just an unequal distribution of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Business Finance graduate.

lenders.name: Astrogirl
lenders.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Geoff & Jenny

lenders.occupational_info: We have a holiday resort that has a huge range of activities where people can come together and enjoy a holiday in Tropical Cairns

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: I beleive what comes around goes around, and sometimes people (like me), just need to be trusted and give a chance to start something great!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small business where I do full body massages. I was trained by a professional world class massuer who travels the world massaging very prosperous famous people. I have an invention I would like to start, but don't have the funds to launch!

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility to pass on the wonderful blessings that I have so graciously been entrusted with.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: would like to help..and make a difference to people's lives.

lenders.name: Shadow
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people who dare to dream, and work to see their dream become their reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and create new technologies to make the world a better place for everyone. I focus my abilities on creating free sustainable energy to everyone in the world, providing a means for clean drinking water, light and warmth. My dream is to see those who dont dare to dream of having these things, enjoy them as a way of life.

lenders.name: Ralph Kerle, Chairman
lenders.loan_because: Our organization has a desire to assist creative leaders by tapping into our membership community to support creative and entrepreneurial endeavours at grass root levels globally
lenders.occupational_info: The Creative Leadership Forum is a global network of over 15,000 senior executives from every spectrum of industry, academia and government working with members to develop and share knowledge, insights and practices in creative leadership and management innovation.

lenders.name: Christophe
lenders.loan_because: A little help to our fellow human beings is the least one can do when one can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for software vendor. My role is to facilitate the resolution of support cases opened by enterprise customers.

lenders.name: Arleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe microlending is a critical tool in the movement to eradicate global poverty. It provides entrepreneurs in developing countries with the opportunity to provide for their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently enrolled in the Masters of Public Administration program at Pace University-Pleasantville, New York.

lenders.name: Ari & her mommy
lenders.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is important around the world and that all of us deserve an equal opportunity.  I feel very blessed in my life and I am honoured to be able to help others on their way to a better life situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been an entrepreneur all my life. I too, started off with very little and grew up in a poor family so I understand how hard it can be. I have worked very hard to get to where I am today and because of this hard work and dedication I am able to provide my family with a very comfortable life. Always remember the key to success: 5% inspiration (idea), 95% perspiration (hard work). Good luck, i wish you the best.

lenders.name: Mike and Nat
lenders.loan_because: A great way to empower people to obtain the finance they need to start or develop their enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: Solicitor/Lawyer

lenders.name: John-Paul
lenders.loan_because: There are honest, hard-working people out there who need an opportunity to better their lives. This is a fantastic forum through which those of us in more fortunate circumstances can facilitate the existence of those opportunities and ensure that hard work is rewarded.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise Banks in Australia on behalf of the Australian Government.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Desire to help others who need a chance to show that they can be responsible and productive.
lenders.occupational_info: Install / repair mechanical systems / plumbing systems....

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Joey

lenders.occupational_info:
I've been fortunate enough to work with entrepreneurs in the UK to follow their passion & do what they love.
Now my focus is working with entrepreneurs to follow their passion through sustainable means & ensuring that a social enterprise becomes the "norm"

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I want to see women become successful business owners to help support and educate their children for particpation in a global economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach courses in community organizing, group work and research.

lenders.name: John & Debbie
lenders.loan_because: faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.occupational_info: Soldier in the U.S. Army

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mom who ran my own business to support my 4 kids.  I want to help other women to have the power  to provide for their families too.
lenders.occupational_info: I have 3 companies - one does small business support, one is a candy store,  and the other purifies and bottles water

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is a primary success factor for all entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping develop green businesses that work to address our eco-challenges

lenders.name: Achim Ladies & More
lenders.occupational_info: We are groups of German ladies who learn English. Instead of giving our teacher a birthday present this year we have loaned through KIVA.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.occupation: Still trying to figure that out

lenders.name: Jack and family
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to share what God has given us
lenders.occupational_info: I work on large machines that keep the insides of buildings warm in the winter and cool in the summer

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to someone who needs it.  I have so much, more than I need, so I want to help those that don't have enough.  If everyone gave a little, everyone would be better off

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: living where I live gives me more opportunity just by being born than millions of people across the world have despite a lifetime of hard work. I hope to reduce this imbalance.
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate contracts between the U.S. Government and a private corporation for products and services used by the U.S. military.

lenders.name: Mel & Dave
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it's fun and I can.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky for what I have.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I've done lots of travel to 3rd world countries such as El Salvador, Nepal and Cambodia and know that sometimes a little help can go a long way...

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing the gifts I have received during my lifetime.  And, in particular, I believe in giving to those who are in more difficult and challenging situations, particularly those in other than "first world" countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise operations for the Union Pacific Railroad and have been with the railroad (originally Southern Pacific) for 38 years.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I accept my responsibility to make the world better. I believe in a better world. I am the Change.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote websites.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: i am very poor. i can't change my life with the small amount of money i earn but maybe i can change someone who really needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: Brutal and demeaning

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: its good
lenders.occupational_info: treat drinking water

lenders.name: Rose Fox
lenders.occupational_info: I make other people's writing better.

lenders.name: Wendy & John
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others.

lenders.name: Marcel Ros
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody should get a chance to follow their dreams and take their future in their own hands. As long as I am in the position to help a hand I will keep doing so - I know how difficult it is to get funding from any commercial banks or lenders!
lenders.occupational_info: At ibc we believe all our business should benefit our employees, our clients and us as entrepreneurs. I travel 80% of my time to talk to our (prospective) clients and our consultants. I motivate, organize and sell.

lenders.name: Floriana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by helping others, you are really helping yourself.  This is the way to alleviate suffering in our world!
lenders.occupational_info: My interest is in spreading the wisdom of Tibetan Buddhism so that we can serve others.

lenders.name: Meghan & Eric
lenders.loan_because:
As humans, we all have a responsibility to alleviate suffering and facilitate the self-actualization of our sisters and brothers around the world.  

We are both vegan, feminist, atheist, and LGBTQ-allied.  Lending on Kiva is one aspect of our activism.
lenders.occupational_info: Meghan is a communications consultant.  Eric is a transportation planner.

lenders.name: Donna and Mike
lenders.loan_because: efforts to advance the common good for all people is something core to our identities, and micro-financing seems to be a most effective way of doing so with our neighbors around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Donna keeps the home front working while Mike manages special information systems projects for his company's global customers.

lenders.name: Clint & Cristy
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I are building a family microcredit network in her hometown to empower the BoP dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Like farming and all the planning, cultivating and harvesting that goes into it, our technology work is in helping people help people.  It's really that simple.

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: I feel good when I know I'm helping someone who really needs it.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: to help bring hope in a sometimes hopeless world.  God is good...all the time.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: it was a fun family night activity

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Mr. & Mrs.
lenders.loan_because: Ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.occupation: working with the World Food Programme in Kenya
lenders.loan_because: it feels right

lenders.name: Agorahaze.com
lenders.loan_because:
Proverbs 14:31 
He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, 
but whoever is kind to the needy honors God.
lenders.occupational_info:
Colossians 3:23
 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,

2 Timothy 2:15 
Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a workman who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth. 

John 3:16 
“For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. 

Mark 12:30 - 31
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength.
The second is this: 'Love your neighbor as yourself.

http://agorahaze.com - coming soon...

lenders.name: Nadir
lenders.occupational_info: create websites, games, and more.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It started with a gift certificate, but my husband and I decided to loan more to do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes faucets.  My job is to ensure that supplied parts are good before we use them to build faucets.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: As an atheist, I believe our highest moral duty is to help our fellow human beings and promote peace and prosperity around the world.

lenders.name: Larissa
lenders.loan_because: I would want the same type of opportunity, and I think it lines up with the attitude God wants us to have towards each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a university library, helping students find books and journal articles to help them with their research.

lenders.name: Nirupan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a participant for many organizations and have raised thousands of dollars.

lenders.name: Viktor
lenders.loan_because: I like people who take risks to improve their lives and the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping customers to use the fitting information technology to solve their business problems.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people, my grandmother who I was very close with just passed away on Febuary 15th and she was a saint. I love her and strive to be like her every day

Nothing is an accident
We are free to have it all
We are whom be want to be
Its in ourselvs to rise or fall
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a 7th Grader from Michigan and love to read, listen to music (the white stripes), and Broadway! The most recent voulenteer work I've done was voulenteer at my local Obama campaign for change office with Ashley Dowser, my team leader

Fired up! Ready to Go!

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: oh, I'm always trying to save the world one sea star at a time
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage world peace by helping children find  their own pathways (yep, saving the world again :)

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.occupation: Founder and ED of VocalEye Descriptive Arts Society
lenders.loan_because: I'm not wealthy enough to give it away.
lenders.occupational_info: I describe live theatre performance and other arts and culture events for people with vision loss.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving someone money is not as effective as helping them to earn more money themselves, and thus help others earn money too.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of people that help college professors choose books for their students to learn from.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending, I believe, is the single greatest way to help others.  If you return all that is repaid to you back into the system for others to use and repay; then it is like having your own charitable organization that will continue in perpetuity.  Not to mention that helping others it is the right thing to do! :)
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a van and deliver office supply orders to people.

lenders.name: Merritt
lenders.loan_because: I have struggled in the past, as a single parent,  to provide for my children. Now that they are grown, I want to help other women to do the same for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach women and young adults to prepare for both college and job training. I help them learn how to learn, and to become good students, employees and parents.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: Women work hard for our families and ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I must live up to my family name.

lenders.name: The Nguyen Family
lenders.loan_because: We help where we can

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because: this is the least I could and should do to show gratitude for the blessings in my life
